mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.title, b.b_writer, b.b_date, count(likes.board_id) as likes from boards as b left outer join likes on b.board_id = likes.board_id group by b.board_id

select b.board_id, b.title, b.b_writer, b.b_date, count(likes.board_id) as likes from boards as b left outer join likes on b.board_id = likes.board_id where b.b_writer = #{b_writer} group by b.board_id

select b.board_id, b.title, b.b_writer, b.b_date, count(likes.board_id) as likes from boards as b left outer join likes on b.board_id = likes.board_id where b.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') group by b.board_id

select b.board_id, b.title, b.b_writer, b.b_date, count(likes.board_id) as likes from boards as b left outer join likes on b.board_id = likes.board_id where b.title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or b.b_writer = #{keyword} group by b.board_id

select b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.b_writer, b.b_date, count(likes.board_id) as likes from boards as b left outer join likes on b.board_id = likes.board_id where b.board_id = #{board_id} group by b.board_id
select * from boards as b where b.board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: insert into boards(title, content, b_writer, writer_email, b_date) value (#{title}, #{content}, #{b_writer}, #{writer_email}, #{b_date})
mapper.update: update boards set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, b_date = #{b_date} where boards.board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from likes where likes.user_id = #{user_id} and likes.board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.delete: delete from likes where board_id = #{board_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
